scripts.dev: concurrently "bun run dev:convex" "bun run dev:watch-convex" "cd native && pnpm run dev" "cd web && pnpm run dev"
scripts.dev:native: concurrently "bun run dev:convex" "bun run dev:watch-convex" "cd native && pnpm run dev"
scripts.dev:web: concurrently "bun run dev:convex" "bun run dev:watch-convex" "cd web && pnpm run dev"
